title: Recruiting
body: Hey  there guys, We are currently looking for a very active jungler and support. We are flexible in what days we play, however for now we don't have exact days that we are playing so if you are on every night, great! We are made up of silver and bronze but we know how to play well. We will climb with the aim learning and getting better individually and as a team. It is necessary to add me and then message me or comment below. It is also essential to have a working headset and Curse Voice.

replies.body: Try me, I'm Bronze 2 support main :)

Hey Fallen

I main jungle, interesting in joining. Solo queue I am Silver 3, haven't done much ranked 5's. Looking for like minded people who want to learn and get better. I play a lot of junglers but mainly go for Rammus, Xin and Udyr at the moment

Hey im keen to play and do have the neccesaties. in a team now and am gold V for that. B5 in soloqueue. Im a Supp main so its hard to climb in that role but i fill it well. look up my SUPP champs kda win rate etc. i can also jg decently.
Heya, I'm looking for a team. My lane prefs are Adc, Sup, Mid > Top > Jg.
